headline: Lilly plans to build a new $3 billion facility to boost oral medicine manufacturing capacity in Europe for patients worldwide
summary: Eli Lilly and Company (NYSE: LLY) announced today plans to build a new $3 billion manufacturing facility in Katwijk, the Netherlands, located within the Leiden Bio Science Park. This major project will expand Lilly's capacity to produce oral medicines and strengthen the company's global supply chain.

headline: Cantor Fitzgerald Reaffirms Price Target on Eli Lilly (LLY) Despite GLP-1 Setback
summary: Eli Lilly & Company (NYSE:LLY) ranks among the stocks with the best earnings growth for the next 5 years. Cantor Fitzgerald reaffirmed its Overweight rating and $925 price target for Eli Lilly & Company (NYSE:LLY) on October 17 following the exclusion of the company’s oral GLP-1 treatment, orforglipron, from the first group of medications to […]

headline: Novo Nordisk: Desperate Move
summary: Novo Nordisk made a surprise bid for Metsera to boost its weight-loss market lead, trading at just 12x 2026 EPS. Read why NVO stock is a buy.
